entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers will continue to affect the road above 800 metres until early Wednesday morning, mainly in the south. A further 1 cm may accumulate on the road. Light snow flurries may continue through to Wednesday afternoon.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers may affect the road above 700 metres until early Wednesday morning. Up to 1 cm may accumulate about the higher parts of the road. Snow flurries may continue in the east through to Wednesday afternoon.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Cold, showery conditions could bring snow flurries to the Remutaka summit above 500 metres. Up to 1 cm may accumulate on the road about the summit until early Wednesday morning.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
